trans-unit.source: The data type of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> 的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: A binding terminal that represents the flow of data into and out of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 表示流入活動與從活動傳出之資料流程的繫結終端機。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a custom `Square` activity has an <xref:System.Activities.InOutArgument%601> of type <xref:System.Int32> named `N1`.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，自訂的 `Square` 活動具有命名為 <xref:System.Activities.InOutArgument%601> 之 <xref:System.Int32> 型別的 `N1`。

trans-unit.source: This argument is used to receive the value to be operated on and is also used to pass the result of the operation back out.
trans-unit.target: 此引數可用來接收要操作的值，也可用來傳回作業寫出的結果。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `Square` activity is hosted in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，`Square` 活動會裝載於工作流程中。

trans-unit.source: A value is passed into the activity and the result is then displayed to the console window by a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> activity.
trans-unit.target: 值會傳遞至活動，然後 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> 活動會在主控台視窗上顯示結果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> class using the specified expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的運算式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" /> that represents the value of this <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" /> 值的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> constructed using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />，初始化並傳回建構的新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The new argument.
trans-unit.target: 新引數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> constructed by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />，初始化並傳回建構的新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The new argument.
trans-unit.target: 新引數。

trans-unit.source: The activity context that contains the value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 包含引數值的活動內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />，取得 <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityContext" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.source: The activity context that contains the location of the argument value.
trans-unit.target: 包含引數值位置的活動內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the value for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InOutArgument`1" /> 之值的位置。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the location where the value of the argument is stored.
trans-unit.target: 引數值儲存位置的參考。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 引數的值。

trans-unit.target: 新引數。

trans-unit.source: The current activity context.
trans-unit.target: 目前的活動內容。

trans-unit.source: The new value.
trans-unit.target: 新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the argument using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值，設定引數的值。
